EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.4 - Director/C-Level - Come see for yourself
EmailTemplate.subject: Maybe you'd like to come see for yourself?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
If you haven’t already, start your cloud-native journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>; why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Learn more by downloading and reading one of our most popular eBooks, Thinking Architecturally <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/thinking-architecturally?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>, by Nathaniel Schutta.
If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> to begin a discussion.
And of course, please stay in touch with the Pivotal Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>, Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> and at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-4&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
